Description.Title: SoilTemperature
Description.ShortDescription: The soil temperature model includes functionality for simulating the heat flux and temperatures over the soil profile, includes temperature on the soil surface. The processes are described below, most are based on Campbell, 1985. "Soil physics with BASIC: Transport models for soil-plant systems"

Input.name: ISoilWater.Salb
Input.description: Fraction of incoming radiation reflected from bare soil

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Initial values for the temperature in each layer (oC)

Input.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
Input.description: Depth down to the constant temperature (mm)

Input.name: pom
Input.description: Particle density of organic matter (Mg/m3), from Campbell (1985)

Input.name: soilConstituentNames
Input.description: List of names of soil constituents

Input.name: numNodes
Input.description: Number of nodes over the soil profile

Input.name: numLayers
Input.description: Number of layers in the soil profile

Input.name: thermCondPar1
Input.description: Parameter 1 for computing thermal conductivity of soil solids

Input.name: thermCondPar2
Input.description: Parameter 2 for computing thermal conductivity of soil solids

Input.name: thermCondPar3
Input.description: Parameter 3 for computing thermal conductivity of soil solids

Input.name: thermCondPar4
Input.description: Parameter 4 for computing thermal conductivity of soil solids

Input.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Input.description: Volumetric specific heat over the soil profile (J/K/m3)

Input.name: morningSoilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature over the soil profile at morning (oC)

Input.name: heatStorage
Input.description: CP, heat storage between nodes (J/K) - index is same as upper node

Input.name: thermalConductance
Input.description: K, conductance of element between nodes (W/K) - index is same as upper node

Input.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Average daily atmosphere boundary layer conductance

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Soil temperature at the end of this iteration (oC)

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Volumetric water content of each soil layer (mm3/mm3)

Input.name: thickness
Input.description: Thickness of each soil, includes phantom layer (mm)

Input.name: bulkDensity
Input.description: Soil bulk density, includes phantom layer (g/cm3)

Input.name: rocks
Input.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks in each soil layer (%)

Input.name: carbon
Input.description: Volumetric fraction of carbon (CHECK, OM?) in each soil layer (%)

Input.name: sand
Input.description: Volumetric fraction of sand in each soil layer (%)

Input.name: silt
Input.description: Volumetric fraction of silt in each soil layer (%)

Input.name: clay
Input.description: Volumetric fraction of clay in each soil layer (%)

Input.name: instrumentHeight
Input.description: Height of instruments above soil surface (m)

Input.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
Input.description: Flag whether boundary layer conductance is calculated or gotten from input

Input.name: netRadiationSource
Input.description: Flag whether net radiation is calculated or gotten from input

Output.name: pom
Output.description: Particle density of organic matter (Mg/m3), from Campbell (1985)

Output.name: ps
Output.description: Particle density of soil fines (Mg/m3)

Output.name: soilConstituentNames
Output.description: List of names of soil constituents

Output.name: timestep
Output.description: Internal time-step (minutes)

Output.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
Output.description: Time of maximum temperature (h)

Output.name: doInitialisationStuff
Output.description: Flag whether initialisation is needed

Output.name: internalTimeStep
Output.description: Internal time-step (s)

Output.name: timeOfDaySecs
Output.description: Time of day from midnight (s)

Output.name: numNodes
Output.description: Number of nodes over the soil profile

Output.name: numLayers
Output.description: Number of layers in the soil profile

Output.name: nodeDepth
Output.description: Depths of nodes (m)

Output.name: thermCondPar1
Output.description: Parameter 1 for computing thermal conductivity of soil solids

Output.name: thermCondPar2
Output.description: Parameter 2 for computing thermal conductivity of soil solids

Output.name: thermCondPar3
Output.description: Parameter 3 for computing thermal conductivity of soil solids

Output.name: thermCondPar4
Output.description: Parameter 4 for computing thermal conductivity of soil solids

Output.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Output.description: Volumetric specific heat over the soil profile (J/K/m3)

Output.name: soilTemp
Output.description: Temperature of each soil layer (oC)

Output.name: morningSoilTemp
Output.description: Soil temperature over the soil profile at morning (oC)

Output.name: heatStorage
Output.description: CP, heat storage between nodes (J/K) - index is same as upper node

Output.name: thermalConductance
Output.description: K, conductance of element between nodes (W/K) - index is same as upper node

Output.name: thermalConductivity
Output.description: thermal conductivity (W.m/K)

Output.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Average daily atmosphere boundary layer conductance

Output.name: newTemperature
Output.description: Soil temperature at the end of this iteration (oC)

Output.name: airTemperature
Output.description: Air temperature (oC)

Output.name: maxTempYesterday
Output.description: Yesterday's maximum daily air temperature (oC)

Output.name: minTempYesterday
Output.description: Yesterday's minimum daily air temperature (oC)

Output.name: soilWater
Output.description: Volumetric water content of each soil layer (mm3/mm3)

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Minimum soil temperature (oC)

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Maximum soil temperature (oC)

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Average soil temperature (oC)

Output.name: thickness
Output.description: Thickness of each soil, includes phantom layer (mm)

Output.name: bulkDensity
Output.description: Soil bulk density, includes phantom layer (g/cm3)

Output.name: rocks
Output.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks in each soil layer (%)

Output.name: carbon
Output.description: Volumetric fraction of carbon (CHECK, OM?) in each soil layer (%)

Output.name: sand
Output.description: Volumetric fraction of sand in each soil layer (%)

Output.name: silt
Output.description: Volumetric fraction of silt in each soil layer (%)

Output.name: clay
Output.description: Volumetric fraction of clay in each soil layer (%)

Output.name: soilRoughnessHeight
Output.description: Height of soil roughness (mm)

Output.name: instrumentHeight
Output.description: Height of instruments above soil surface (m)

Output.name: netRadiation
Output.description: Net radiation per internal time-step (MJ)

Output.name: canopyHeight
Output.description: Height of canopy above ground (m)

Output.name: instrumHeight
Output.description: Height of instruments above ground

Output.name: nu
Output.description: Forward/backward differencing coefficient (0-1)

Output.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
Output.description: Flag whether boundary layer conductance is calculated or gotten from input

Output.name: netRadiationSource
Output.description: Flag whether net radiation is calculated or gotten from input

Output.name: FinalSoilTemperature
Output.description: Temperatures over the soil profile at end of a day, i.e. at midnight

Output.name: FinalSoilSurfaceTemperature
Output.description: Temperature of soil surface at end of a day, i.e. at midnight

Output.name: Value
Output.description: Temperature of soil layers averaged over a day

Output.name: AverageSoilTemperature
Output.description: Temperatures over soil profile averaged over a day

Output.name: AverageSoilSurfaceTemperature
Output.description: Temperature of soil surface averaged over a day

Output.name: MinimumSoilTemperature
Output.description: Minimum temperatures over the soil profile within a day

Output.name: MinimumSoilSurfaceTemperature
Output.description: Minimum temperatures of soil surface within a day

Output.name: MaximumSoilTemperature
Output.description: Maximum temperatures over the soil profile within a day

Output.name: MaximumSoilSurfaceTemperature
Output.description: Maximum temperatures of soil surface within a day

Output.name: BoundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Atmosphere boundary layer conductance averaged over a day

Output.name: ThermalConductivity
Output.description: Thermal conductivity over the soil profile

Output.name: HeatCapacity
Output.description: Volumetric heat capacity over the soil profile

Output.name: HeatStore
Output.description: Heat storage over the soil profile

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Gets the volumetric specific heat of soil constituents (MJ/m3/K)

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Gets the thermal conductance of soil constituents (W/K)

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Gets the shape factor of soil constituents (W/m/K - CHECK, unit)

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks in the soil (m3/m3)

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter in the soil (m3/m3)

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of sand in the soil (m3/m3)

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of silt in the soil (m3/m3)

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of clay in the soil (m3/m3)

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of water in the soil (m3/m3)

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of ice in the soil (m3/m3)

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of air in the soil (m3/m3)

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Calculate the density of air at a given environmental conditions

Function.name: OnStartOfSimulation
Function.description: Performs the tasks to initialise the model

Function.name: OnProcess
Function.description: Performs the tasks to simulate soil temperature

Function.name: Reset
Function.description: Performs the tasks to reset the model

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Interpolate air temperature

Function.name: doUpdate
Function.description: Determine min, max, and average soil temperature from the half-hourly iterations

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Convert degrees Celcius to Kelvin

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Computes the long-wave radiation emitted by a body

Function.name: calcLayerTemperature
Function.description: Gets the average soil temperature for each soil layer

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Calculate the net radiation at the soil surface

Function.name: boundCheck
Function.description: Checks whether a variable within lower and upper bounds
